actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce, and in addition to the Committees on Oversight and Government Reform, and Financial Services, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

official_title: To provide consequences to States that reduce their State minimum wage and to redirects Federal funding to those States to the neediest localities.

titles.title: To provide consequences to States that reduce their State minimum wage and to redirects Federal funding to those States to the neediest localities.
